text:
I'm playing with the idea of presenting a dropdown for the editors that *display colors* in the dropdown instead of text.
What I get VS what I want:
I tried a dirty inline style on the "text part of the "choice" field like this:
But it just turns into this, where the HubL doesn't do its magic

To make it even more clear:
if we look at this as a "*key*-*value*" pair, the *key* is the only one who gets HubL'd. Any way around this?
